1. Video Setup.tooltip: Load your video file in the main GUI
Check that video loads and plays
Verify resolution and frame rate are correct

2. Field Calibration.tooltip: Use Setup Wizard → Field Calibration to mark field corners
Check that field size matches your actual field
Verify players are detected within field bounds

3. Team Colors.tooltip: Use Setup Wizard → Team Colors to detect team jersey colors
Check that teams are correctly identified
Fine-tune color detection if teams are misidentified

4. Ball Colors.tooltip: Use Setup Wizard → Ball Colors to detect ball color
Check that ball is detected in video
Fine-tune if ball is not detected consistently

5. Player Identification.tooltip: Use Setup Wizard → Tag Players to identify players
Enter jersey numbers for each player
Ensure each player has correct team assignment
Use 'Tag All Instances' for better tracking

6. Anchor Frames.tooltip: Anchor frames help with player identification
Tag players in multiple frames for better accuracy
Check that anchor frames are accurate

7. Analysis Settings.tooltip: Set tracker type, buffer, etc. in main GUI
Enable Re-ID for cross-video player identification
Set output video format, CSV export, etc.

8. Analytics Configuration.tooltip: Use Analytics Selection button to choose metrics
Set which analytics show in video

9. Project Saving.tooltip: Save all settings to project file
Load project to verify all settings saved correctly

10. Testing & Validation.tooltip: Run a short preview to test settings
Check that players are tracked correctly
Check that teams are correctly identified
Verify ball is tracked throughout video
Check that analytics are calculated correctly
